insight: **Network Quality Churn Insight:** This high-value customer ($4822 CLTV) churned despite subscribing to Operator B (Champion)'s premium "Infinite Ultimate" plan due to network issues in Rural Texas. Their extremely high data usage (132.13GB download) and significant OTT consumption (21.41GB) suggests streaming and connectivity problems in their area. They likely switched to Operator T's "Go5G Next" which offers better network coverage in rural areas.
